author: Reuters
title: BRIEF-Lock-up period for Hareon Solar Technology's 1.48 bln shares to end
text:
Sept 8 Hareon Solar Technology Co Ltd
* Says lock-up period for 1.48 billion shares to end, shares to start trading on Sept 14
Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/1Nn0vPa
Further company coverage: (Reporting by Hong Kong and Singapore newsrooms)
